title: Land for sale in Colombo 08
details:

Exclusive neighborhood and peaceful surroundings area

It’s Land facing a 20 feet road
60 feet road frontage

200 mtrs to main road (Cotta road)
500 mtrs to Borella junction

Close to Supermarket, Banks, and hospitals, Schools

Land extent 15 perches 6.5 Million per Perch
